item.title: 🦀 bugthesystem/Flux (666 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: bugthesystem

📝 Repository: bugthesystem/Flux

📄 Descrizione: [Experimental] Flux is a high-performance message transport library for Rust that implements patterns inspired by LMAX Disruptor and Aeron. It provides lock-free inter-process communication (IPC), UDP transport, and reliable UDP with optimized memory management for applications with low latency requirements.

⭐ Stelle: 666

🍴 Forks: 10

💻 Linguaggio: Rust

🏷️ Topics: aeron disruptor high-performance iouring numa reliable-udp rust simd udp

📜 Licenza: MIT License

⏰ Creato il: 2025-07-15T17:28:54Z

🔄 Ultimo Aggiornamento: 2025-07-22T03:27:14Z

Visita il Repository su GitHub

]]>
